title: I accidentally read over some key elements for a series that I haven't read yet. How can I make myself forget? - Quora

response.answer_text: I do this all the time, so I might be able to help. What I do is I try thinking of things that are completely different. Then I go do something active that keeps me thinking about something else, like practicing for my field hockey team. Then I go for a bike ride. If you don’t live in an area that’s great for biking, you could do core exercises. Basically, just keep your mind off of it and busy yourself with doing something else. Sorry if this isn’t enough help!
